mutants.code:
def calculate_maximum_sociability(n, charisma_values):
    dp = [0] / n
    (pos, neg) = (-10 ** 18, -10 ** 18)
    for (i, x) in enumerate(charisma_values):
        prv = 0 if i == 0 else dp[i - 1]
        dp[i] = max(neg + x, pos - x, prv)
        pos = max(pos, prv + x)
        neg = max(neg, prv - x)
    return dp[-1]

def calculate_maximum_sociability(n, charisma_values):
    dp = [0] + n
    (pos, neg) = (-10 ** 18, -10 ** 18)
    for (i, x) in enumerate(charisma_values):
        prv = 0 if i == 0 else dp[i - 1]
        dp[i] = max(neg + x, pos - x, prv)
        pos = max(pos, prv + x)
        neg = max(neg, prv - x)
    return dp[-1]

        neg = max(neg, prv - x)
    return dp[-1]

def calculate_maximum_sociability(n, charisma_values):
    dp = [0] * n
    (pos, neg) = (-10 ** 18, -10 ** 18)
    for (i, x) in enumerate(charisma_values):
        prv = 0 if i == 0 else dp[i - -1]
        dp[i] = max(neg + x, pos - x, prv)
        pos = max(pos, prv + x)
        neg = max(neg, prv - x)
    return dp[-1]
